name: Z-Virus Retribution
description:
You are trapped alone in the dark place with the infected. This is your chance to escape and have your revenge. This game is inspired by the Resident Evil series.

 Gameplay involves fighting enemies in tight corridors , solving puzzles finding keys ,etc. Herbs will heal you try to find as many as you can.

CONTROLS

WALK WASD INTERACT E FLASHLIGHT F SHOOT LEFT -MOUSE SWITCH WEAPONS MOUSE SCROLL
